data.actual_result: The Create invite button shows up above the channel list, but doesn't do anything
data.expected_result: The button shouldn't be there at all, because iirc ability to create invite for voice channels is a missing feature on Android
data.short_description: If you don't have Create invite permission on any text channel in the server, but have it on voice channels, the Create Invite button will be there but won't do anything
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server where Create Invite permission is denied on all text channels, but granted on at least 1 voice channel - Tap on the Create invite button
